column2: "Na Nyankopɔn kaa Noa
column3: na adze a nkwa wɔ mu a wɔnye no wɔ hɛn no mu no nyinara: na Nyankopɔn maa mframa bɔe faa asaase do

column2: "bun no no nsunyiwa so nye ɔsor ntokura ano sisiwii
column3: na nsu a ofi sor gyaa tɔ;"

column2: "na nsu no kɔr do ara twee fii asaase do: na nda ɔha eduonum n'ekyir na nsu no huamee."
"Na ehɛn no kesii Ararat nkokwaa do wɔ bosoom a otsia esuon no mu
column3: bosoom no ne da a otsia duesuon no mu."

column2: "Na nsu no kɔr do twee araa dze kodur bosoom a otsia du no mu no
column3: bosoom no ne da a odzi kan no mu

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ adaduanan ekyir no
column3: Noa buee hɛn no no tokura a ɔyɛe no:"

column2: "na ɔsomaa akonkoran
column3: na ofiir edzi kekyinii araa ma ɔdze kɛpeem dɛ nsu wewewee fii asaase do."

column2: "Na ɔsomaa ebubur fii ne nkyɛn
column3: dɛ ɔnkɔhwɛ kyerɛ nsu no ehuam efi asaase enyi;"

column2: "na ebubur no ennya ne nan sibew
column3: na ɔsanee baa no hɔ wɔ hɛn no mu
column4: osiandɛ nsu no wɔ asaase nyinara enyi: na ɔtseen ne nsa suoo no mu
column5: na ɔdze no baa ne nkyɛn wɔ hɛn no mu."

column2: "Na ɔtweɔɔn nda esuon so bio; na ɔsomaa ebubur no fii hɛn no mu bio;"
"na ebubur no sanee baa no hɔ ewimbir no; na
column4: olive ahataw momon a ɔatsew tua n'ano: nna Noa hun dɛ nsu no atwe efi asaase do."

column2: "Na ɔtweɔɔn nda esuon so bio; na ɔsomaa ebubur no; na ɔannsan ammba no hɔ bio."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ Noa ne mfe a otsia ahaesia nye kor no mu
column3: bosoom a odzi kan no ne da a odzi kan no
column4: nsu no wewewee fii asaase do; na Noa yii hɛn no ne nkatado no

column2: "Na bosoom a otsia ebien no mu
column3: bosoom no ne da a otsia eduonu esuon no

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn kasaa kyerɛɛ Noa dɛ
column7: nye wo mba hɔn yernom no ka wo ho."

column2: "Fa adze a nkwa wɔ hɔn mu a wɔnye wo wɔ hɔ nyinara a ɔwɔ honam nyinara mu ka wo ho pue
column5: nye nketsebowa a wɔwea asaase do nyinara; ama wɔaawo

column2: "Na Noa nye ne yer na ne mba
column3: nye ne mba hɔn yernom ka no ho fiir edzi:"

column2: "mbowadoma nketsebowa nyinara
column4: na adze biara a nkwa wɔ mu wɔ asaase do
column5: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn mbowa ban tsetsee

column2: "Na Noa sii afɔrmbukyia maa EWURADZE; na ɔfaa mbowa a hɔn ho tsew nyinara mu bi
column3: na ɔdze hɔn bɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE tsee afɔr no no huam; na EWURADZE kaa wɔ n'akoma mu dɛ
column3: Monnkɔdom asaase bio ara da wɔ nyimpa ntsi
column4: osiandɛ minyim dɛ nyimpa n'akoma mu nsusui muo dze fitsi no mbofra mu; nkyii so mennkɛsɛɛ adze a nkwa wɔ mu biara bio ara da

column2: "Mber tsentsen ara a asaase wɔ hɔ yi
